content.raw: Maybe adding some intermediary documentation to \([#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDocker](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDocker)\) might be a good idea for some example vehicle configurations \(i.e. 1 X1 vehicle `ign launch competition.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`\) for now as competitors work on updating.
